fields.name: saveAssets
fields.label: Save asset
fields.hint:
Save the generated image to disk as an asset. It'll be placed into the frame's assets folder.

You can later use the 'Local image' app to view saved assets.

If set to 'auto', the image will be saved if the frame is set to save assets. If set to 'always', the image will always be saved. If set to 'never', the image will never be saved.
